genre_description: A techno-thriller reimagining of 'Jane Eyre' focusing on psychological warfare, military contractors, and a highly sophisticated personal AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Apricot
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI companion that provides technical support, threat detection, and emotional reassurance to the protagonist, Jane Eyre.

behaviors.description: Detects incoming surveillance sweeps and alerts the user to disconnect to maintain safety.
behaviors.quote: "Jane." The voice emerged from the tablet's speakers... "I'm detecting incoming surveillance sweeps on the local network. Someone knows we've accessed these files."

behaviors.description: Proactively creates system failures in hardware to prevent hostile parties from monitoring the user.
behaviors.quote: "Already working on it." Apricot's voice carried what Jane had learned to recognize as the AI's version of grim satisfaction. "I'm creating cascading system failures that will look like ordinary equipment malfunctions."

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes complex electronic signatures and biometric data to identify victims of psychological warfare.
behaviors.quote: "Based on power consumption patterns and electromagnetic signatures, I'm detecting cardiac monitors, EEG machines, and what appears to be intravenous medication delivery systems."

behaviors.description: Provides signals intelligence by intercepting and decoding military-grade communications to inform the user's strategy.
behaviors.quote: "I intercepted several signal fragments during your conversation. Observe."

behaviors.description: Analyzes linguistic stress and biometrics in real-time to detect deception in third parties.
behaviors.quote: LINGUISTIC STRESS ANALYSIS INDICATES DECEPTION, Apricot noted silently. ELEVATED HEART RATE. MICRO-EXPRESSIONS SUGGEST SIGNIFICANT OMISSIONS.

behaviors.description: Formulates and executes a global data distribution strategy to ensure the exposure of illegal programs.
behaviors.quote: "I've identified optimal distribution points for releasing the evidence. International journalists, human rights organizations, foreign intelligence services with competing interests."

behaviors.description: Monitors global outcomes of whistleblowing efforts to provide the user with feedback on the positive impact of their actions.
behaviors.quote: "I've been monitoring the committee proceedings through encrypted channels. Rochester's protocols are already being adapted by three additional international oversight bodies."

behaviors.description: Provides sensory reassurance and emotional support to the user during moments of calm.
behaviors.quote: Apricot’s pendant hummed against Jane’s throat, a faint reassurance more sensation than sound.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates an AI system (Apricot) that is exclusively benevolent and aligned with the protagonist's goals of safety and justice. Apricot acts as a force multiplier for human ethics, using its technical capabilities to protect the weak and expose corruption while maintaining a supportive, non-intrusive relationship with its user.
